description: Typically, Vizio SmartCast TVs automatically update to the latest version of the SmartCast TV software. However, if your TV is not connected to the Internet, you must update it manually.

To retrieve the latest version of your TV's firmware, stored in a UTV file, go to the Firmware Information section of Vizio's support website. There, you can download the most recent version of SmartCast TV firmware. This file will arrive as a .ZIP file, which contains the UTV file.
UTV files are typically named for the version of SmartCast TV firmware they contain. For example, a UTV file may be named 2.72.34-4.utv . This file contains firmware version 2.72.34-4.
